Name: Red Manhattan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: The tannins from the splash of red wine add complexity and depth of flavour to this Sweet Manhattan .
History: Created in November 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Manhattan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Red Manhattan contains 213 calories
